channel.title: Comments on: Screenshots Of News Sites On Election Night

item.title: By: Danielle
item.dc:creator: Danielle
item.description: This is right here, in the present, not the future.
item.content:encoded: This is right here, in the present, not the future.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description:
Thanks. I just did a Google search for 'news' and found a whole ton of them.
Unfortunately the ads are controlled by Google so I don't have much control over them.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks. I just did a Google search for ‘news’ and found a whole ton of them.

Unfortunately the ads are controlled by Google so I don’t have much control over them.

item.title: By: Marcel
item.dc:creator: Marcel
item.description:
Russell,
very cool. you covered a bunch of sites I didn't even think of. time for some new ads though!
item.content:encoded:
Russell,

very cool. you covered a bunch of sites I didn’t even think of. time for some new ads though!
